headline.main: Longtime Captain Christie Rampone Honored Before US Game
headline.print_headline: Longtime Captain Christie Rampone Honored Before US Game

lead_paragraph: Longtime captain Christie Rampone is walking away from the U.S. national women's soccer team hoping to be remembered as a team player whose fondest memories will be of the players who joined her journey, which lasted almost two decades.
snippet: Longtime captain Christie Rampone is walking away from the U.S. national women's soccer team hoping to be remembered as a team player whose fondest memories will be of the players who joined her journey, which lasted almost two decades....
